wikipedia_page.main: John Hayter (1756–1818) was an English churchman and academic, known as an antiquary.

response: In 1802, King Ferdinand IV of Naples appointed Rev. John Hayter to assist the process.
John Hayter   (21 October 1800 – 3 June 1895) was an English portrait painter who was Painter-in-Ordinary to Queen Victoria, whom he first painted when she was 12 years old.
File:Sir Benjamin Hallowell Carew by John Hayter.jpg|Admiral Sir Benjamin Carew c 1833
